website_summaries.verdict: A fun, cool-looking, and truly unique self-balancing personal transporter and rollerblade alternative that lets its user smoothly zip around over smoother surfaces for a solid 45 minutes.
pros: 45 minutes of ride time per charge
cons: There is a bit of a learning curve with the Drift W1, but once you get it, it’s like riding a bike and you’ll never forget how to cruise around on it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Latino America summer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! They are easier to ride than i thought. Fun and seem to be really well manufactured. Regards from Chile! South america. (Mercadolibre: segway drifts)
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Marino

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient guide and training provided
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get a hang of it. Lack of resources and training and manual make learning rather challenging. Also the build quality is a bit unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Er

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Also my little daughter enjoys it. I think I need to buy one more. :)
customer_reviews.author: Popeye

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, super quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got these skates for my 6 year old daughter. After about 4 hrs of learning curve, she skates like a pro! She pulls her sister in the wagon while riding these, lol. My only complaint (saving grace?) is they are limited to a 220 pound rider so I can’t try them out. She wears a helmet and wrist gaurds while riding. Even though they are very controllable, she is still flying forward with nothing between her and any obstacle!
customer_reviews.author: Marthoula

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the slightest bump or pebble, or go flying!
customer_reviews.text: In the videos, they show these going on the road and sidewalks. HA! These are only usable indoors on a perfectly clean floor. The wheels have no bounce. They are rock hard. So if you hit anything taller than small pebble, the wheel stops! You can kinda make it over small bumps if you take it carefully like a speedbump, but it is risky. That stated.. I got to ride these for a week in an empty office building, and they are WONDERFUL if you have lots of sq/ft of open space. Easy to learn, easy to control.. yeah.. just don't take them outside where you might come across a rogue acorn.
customer_reviews.author: Fugetabutit

customer_reviews.title: Junk. That is all I have to say.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a year ago with high expectations after great previous experiences with segway onebot and segway ninebot. My kids have loved those products. The onebot has been a hit. The Drift skates are literally a flop. They don't stay charged long enough to be any fun. They have literally been used a handful of times because they are worthless. Wish I could trade them for a onebot. Don't even waste your money on these things. Choose a different segway product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Capener

customer_reviews.title: 1000% worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these little "skates." They were my 3AM and bored Prime purchase. Must say, I am not dissatisfied in any way. I've shown them to all of my friends who now want a pair of their own. I've only ridden inside on them, and they're extremely smooth. My one warning is beware riding over an area rug. Sometimes I have no issues, other times... the skates seem like they want to eat the rug, and I go flying. Totally worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTHE SURFACES ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: I always read reviews before purchasing, but take them with a grain of salt. ALL reviews accurate about these things. I'm 200 lbs 5'11"... I could not get my weight centered without my toes way over the front, which then kept me from being able to go forward easily. The other HUGE issue... couldn't ride down sidewalk, because every small crack they jarred abruptly shifting my weight causing me to have to jump off. Didnt even give them an hour of my time. Packed right back up and sent back. ONLY MEANT FOR SMOOTHE SURFACES and probably teens or people with less than average body builds.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Altmann

customer_reviews.title: Segway

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Horse Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the intention of putting them on my horse. However, I had to buy two boxes since only two come in a box. The first time we put them under Charly’s hooves, he was a little wobbly. It took a couple days for him to get used to it. I feel that my horse is actually slower now with these new shoes on. I also feel he is getting lazy and a little overweight. I would avoid this product, if you intend to use them on your horse.

customer_reviews.title: Alert!!!!!

This was to be a special surprise gift for my 14 year old for Christmas. Well ...no longer 😞 The postman needed a signature and she answered the door. For the last two years she has loved the Segway and I’m hoping these will be the same!

product_meta.title: Segway Ninebot Drift W1, Electric Roller Skates Hovershoes, Two Wheels self Balancing Scooter with RGB LED, Rollerblades for Kids and Adults
product_meta.description: The Segway Drift W1 Electric Hovershoes are lightweight, portable and extremely unique. Designed for maximum comfort and fun, the Drift W1 is the perfect product to usher in a new type of personal transportation. UL 2272 certified and designed for all ages.
feature_bullets: Superior Technology: Stable self-balancing technology enables to move effortlessly. The high-power hub motor and spindle-shaped tread design help achieve more flexible steering. With Smart Battery Management System and UL 2272 provide dual protection

Safe & Comfortable Riding: With uniquely designed ambient and tail lights to keep you safe in the dark. The rubber tires are designed to improve stability, steering capabilities, and combined with slip-resistance on the pads bring maximum comfort and fun.

Easy to Learn: The Segway Drift W1 e-skates are very easy to pick up and learn. With superior technology, just step on and get going effortlessly in minutes. It's lightweight and convenient to carry in a bag or in your hand to bring anywhere.

Powerful Performance: A single fully charged battery can run up to 45 minutes and top speed of 7.5 mph. For both adults and children, single e-skate weighs 7.7 lbs but can carry a max payload of 220 lbs. IP54 enable you to ride in all weather conditions.

Quality Assurance: The 10mm silicone bumpers at each end are designed to protect your product from bumps and scratches. One-year or 180-day warranty for different parts, please refer to warranty information in product details below.
